TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextTranslationSkill extends Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.Skill

Docs.summary: A skill to translate text from one language to another.

Public Sub New (inputs As IList(Of InputFieldMappingEntry), outputs As IList(Of OutputFieldMappingEntry), defaultToLanguageCode As TextTranslationSkillLanguage, Optional name As String = null, Optional description As String = null, Optional context As String = null, Optional defaultFromLanguageCode As Nullable(Of TextTranslationSkillLanguage) = null, Optional suggestedFrom As Nullable(Of TextTranslationSkillLanguage) = null)

MemberSignature.Usage: new Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TextTranslationSkill (inputs, outputs, defaultToLanguageCode, name, description, context, defaultFromLanguageCode, suggestedFrom)

Docs.param: Inputs of the skills could be a column in the source data set, or the output of an upstream skill.
The output of a skill is either a field in an Azure Search index, or a value that can be consumed as an input by another skill.

The language code to translate documents into for documents that don't specify the to language explicitly. Possible values include: 'af', 'ar', 'bn', 'bs', 'bg', 'yue', 'ca', 'zh-Hans', 'zh-Hant', 'hr', 'cs', 'da', 'nl', 'en', 'et', 'fj', 'fil', 'fi', 'fr', 'de', 'el', 'ht', 'he', 'hi', 'mww', 'hu', 'is', 'id', 'it', 'ja', 'sw', 'tlh', 'ko', 'lv', 'lt', 'mg', 'ms', 'mt', 'nb', 'fa', 'pl', 'pt', 'otq', 'ro', 'ru', 'sm', 'sr-Cyrl', 'sr-Latn', 'sk', 'sl', 'es', 'sv', 'ty', 'ta', 'te', 'th', 'to', 'tr', 'uk', 'ur', 'vi', 'cy', 'yua'

The name of the skill which uniquely identifies it within the skillset. A skill with no name defined will be given a default name of its 1-based index in the skills array, prefixed with the character '#'.
The description of the skill which describes the inputs, outputs, and usage of the skill.
Represents the level at which operations take place, such as the document root or document content (for example, /document or /document/content). The default is /document.

The language code to translate documents from for documents that don't specify the from language explicitly. Possible values include: 'af', 'ar', 'bn', 'bs', 'bg', 'yue', 'ca', 'zh-Hans', 'zh-Hant', 'hr', 'cs', 'da', 'nl', 'en', 'et', 'fj', 'fil', 'fi', 'fr', 'de', 'el', 'ht', 'he', 'hi', 'mww', 'hu', 'is', 'id', 'it', 'ja', 'sw', 'tlh', 'ko', 'lv', 'lt', 'mg', 'ms', 'mt', 'nb', 'fa', 'pl', 'pt', 'otq', 'ro', 'ru', 'sm', 'sr-Cyrl', 'sr-Latn', 'sk', 'sl', 'es', 'sv', 'ty', 'ta', 'te', 'th', 'to', 'tr', 'uk', 'ur', 'vi', 'cy', 'yua'

The language code to translate documents from when neither the fromLanguageCode input nor the defaultFromLanguageCode parameter are provided, and the automatic language detection is unsuccessful. Default is en. Possible values include: 'af', 'ar', 'bn', 'bs', 'bg', 'yue', 'ca', 'zh-Hans', 'zh-Hant', 'hr', 'cs', 'da', 'nl', 'en', 'et', 'fj', 'fil', 'fi', 'fr', 'de', 'el', 'ht', 'he', 'hi', 'mww', 'hu', 'is', 'id', 'it', 'ja', 'sw', 'tlh', 'ko', 'lv', 'lt', 'mg', 'ms', 'mt', 'nb', 'fa', 'pl', 'pt', 'otq', 'ro', 'ru', 'sm', 'sr-Cyrl', 'sr-Latn', 'sk', 'sl', 'es', 'sv', 'ty', 'ta', 'te', 'th', 'to', 'tr', 'uk', 'ur', 'vi', 'cy', 'yua'
